name: Chronalmental
description: The Chronalmental is a large elemental embodying time, notable for its substantial hit points and high agility with an exceptional Dexterity score.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate time and heal itself during effects like slow or haste makes it a unique adversary.
goals: Engage in combat while manipulating the flow of time.
relations: Can be found alongside other elementals or creatures that have abilities related to time.
environment: Often found in locations where the fabric of time is unstable or elemental entities gather.
strengths: High resilience with immunities to poison and nonmagical physical attacks.
weaknesses: Relatively low Intelligence and Charisma, limiting its social interactions.
attacks: Three Slam attacks with considerable bludgeoning damage, enhancing its melee presence.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to stun an opponent and send them outside the flow of time.
additional_information: Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Automatically succeeds on saving throws against slowing or hasting effects.
Can heal itself when impacted by time manipulation spells.
Capable of teleporting to avoid attacks.
Gains advantages in actions and speed when it steals time.
test_queries: large creature immune to nonmagical attacks
agile creature with slam attack abilities
